se.cbb.jprime.consensus.day

Class PSWVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.consensus.day.PSWVertex

  • public class PSWVertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Multifurcating vertex of a PSW tree. Holds some of the information used by Day's algorithms, etc.:
    • If a leaf, integer label (as numbered in a DFS traversal unless created with an existing tree as a template). Interior vertices have number -1.
    • If a leaf, the name of the vertex.
    • The smallest integer label of the leaves in the subtree rooted at the vertex.
    • The largest integer label of the leaves in the subtree rooted at the vertex.
    • Weight, i.e. the number of proper descendants of the vertex.
    • The number of leaves of the subtree rooted at the vertex.
    • For reference, the original number of the vertex in the tree from which the PSW tree was created.
    The min, max, and weight above constitute the "post-order sequence with weights", PSW, info.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumber

        public int getNumber()
        Returns the integer label of this vertex.
        Returns:
        the integer label, -1 if an interior vertex.

      • setNumber

        public void setNumber(int number)
        Sets the integer label of this vertex. Leaves are numbered from 0 to |L(T)|-1 while interior vertices should be -1.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to be set.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this vertex.
        Returns:
        the name if a leaf; null if an interior vertex.

      • getMinMaxWeight

        public IntTriple getMinMaxWeight()
        Returns the min and max numbers of the leaves in the subtree rooted at the vertex, along with the weight.
        Returns:
        min and max.

        Returns:

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight()
        Returns the number of proper descendants of this vertex, e.g. 0 for a leaf.
        Returns:
        the number of proper descendants.

      • getNoOfLeaves

        public int getNoOfLeaves()
        Returns the number of leaves of the subtree rooted at this vertex, e.g. 1 for a leaf.
        Returns:
        the number of leaves.

      • hasContiguousLeafSpan

        public boolean hasContiguousLeafSpan()
        Returns true if the min and max label span of this vertex is compatible with the number of leaves, i.e. the subtree contains all the leaves min,min+1,...,max.
        Returns:

      • getOriginalNumber

        public int getOriginalNumber()
        For reference, returns the original number the vertex corresponding to this had in the original input tree. Do not confuse this with the regular number, which is the one used in Day algorithms.
        Returns:
        the original number.
